name: Set lat and lng as payload
Check if lookingEvent exists in the last 9 sun events
Urządzenie włączone
func:
msg.deviceOn = (msg.laptop === 'Unlocked' && msg.laptop_battery_powerline === 'Online')
 || (msg.laptop_cat === 'Unlocked' && msg.laptop_cat_battery_powerline === 'Online')
 || msg.computer === 'Unlocked'
return msg;
